r.d: This package provides support for indexing XML files. It assists you in creating and using such indexes in order to reduce access-time to local XML files.
r.n: * Added DOM fetching method : fetchDomNodes() * WARNING: Suppressed the XML_Indexing_Reader::next() method. Fetching data is now performed by either fetchStrings() or fetchDomNodes() * Added support for /simple/xpath/expressions (that is : without any [n] or [@attr] specification) * Added support for the last() xpath function, as in /path/to/element[last()] * Matched regions might come up in a messed up order for certain queries : fixed * Fixed a bug where some junk files where created in the system's temporary directory. This fix adds a new package requirement : File ; version >= 1.0.3 * Added profiling support to the XML_Indexing_Reader class
